To get length of a number, convert integer to string using strconv.Itoa() method then use len() method it will count and return number of integer elements.

In golang the len() method used for counts elements.

Let‚Äôs start

package main
import (
  "fmt"
  "strconv"
)

func main() {
  num := 847883663;
	fmt.Println("Length of number", len(strconv.Itoa(num)))
}

In the above program, we are accessing length of number, let‚Äôs see the output.
